ygData.subject: Re: Optional locations
ygData.msgSnippet: I will do my best to eliminate Unrest as a possibility.  The gnome spelunker in the underwater cave MIGHT drop something useful at some time.  I still get
ygData.messageBody:
I will do my best to eliminate Unrest as a possibility. The gnome
spelunker in the underwater cave MIGHT drop something useful at some
time. I still get experience so I will be at him until at least he turns
green :)

Madix/Atinky



>You have water in and under freeport, in oasis, in guk, everfrost, lakerathe,
>eruds crossing, and kerra isle. So, we have a big journey ahead of
>us. Anyone
>wanna start eliminating the possibilities?
>
>-Kryogen Katpsaw
>The almost completely fet-up with tinkering
